question: Who chairs the meeting of the Financial Stability and Development Council (FSDC)?
explanation:
The Union Finance Minister chairs the Financial Stability and Development Council (FSDC) meeting. FSDC was constituted as a non-statutory apex body under the Ministry of Finance in 2010.
Recently, the 23rd FSDC meeting was chaired by the Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman via video conferencing. The meeting discussed Indiaâ€™s efforts to economic recovery and the policy measures taken by the government.
